title: What Are The Latest News On UFO Sightings Around The Globe? Find here true stories s of unexplained phenomena and others. : CrawlerSightings
text:
subscribe unsubscribe 389 readers ~0 users here now 
Throughout my time on Reddit, I've read many stories regarding a sighting of a creature with pale skin, long-limbs and a tall, thin body. Names have been thrown around such as Fleshgait, Skin Walker, Wendigo, etc, but these terms are generally culture-affected. I prefer to call them Crawlers based on the way they are described to move. 
Welcome to the subreddit; here you will find many reported sightings of Crawlers. Feel free to post true stories or images from around the internet, as well as your own experiences. createdby Bocaj1000 a community for 6 months
